abstract: Comprehensive design system guide for Ruby on Rails applications, designed for AI agents and LLMs. Contains 47 rules across 8 categories, prioritized by impact from critical (design decisions, design tokens) to incremental (consistency and organization). Each rule includes detailed explanations, real-world examples comparing incorrect vs. correct implementations, and specific impact metrics to guide automated refactoring and code generation. Complements rails-dev and tailwind skills by covering the UI component architecture layer.
